idea: Siri Ventures is a startup to provide "something different" products or services. The first venture is called "Eco-Smart Community", which is a Star Rating System to gauge/audit the Liveability index of a Gated Community! The concept aims to make gated communities or residential/commercial complexes into Eco-Smart Communities. The mission is to make Smart Communities who in turn contribute to make Smart Cities!
name: SIRI VENTURES

idea:
According to research, out of 1000 people, who start writing their book,

only 30 of them publish their book in their lifetime. And out of those 30,

only 6 of them publish their book.

When Anshuman Patro, an entrepreneur who had already published 10

books read about this, he found that most people look at book publishing

the wrong way.

That lead to the birth of a unique program called #5DayAuthorChallenge.

In this unique program, he strategically put all his years of experience of

writing books and making them the bestsellers, so that anyone can

actually publish their book in just 5 days and make it a bestseller.

Unlike other online courses available on the internet, he personally works

with the authors for 5 days to make sure they publish their books by the

end of this workshop.

Within a year, he helped hundreds of people publish their books and most

of them were best sellers.

#5DayAuthorChallenge
name: Anshuman Patro

idea: Brand Beavers is a digital agency helping business to provide digital services and creating our on digital products to scale the business.
